title: "Using neural networks for faster X-ray imaging"
excerpt: "It sounds like a dispatch from the distant future: a computer system that can not only reconstruct images from reams of X-ray data at hundreds of times the speed of current methods, but can learn from experience and design better and more efficient ways of calculating those reconstructions."
